title: Lynn Appelbaum to Receive PRSA’s Outstanding Educator Award (PRSA - Public Relations Society of America) ...
text: ( Source : PRSA - Public Relations Society of America ) NEW YORK , Oct. 26, 2015 - The Public Relations Society of America (PRSA) announced today that Lynn Appelbaum, APR , Fellow PRSA, will receive its Outstanding Educator Award . The award will
